_comments.approvedTerms: Words and phrases that align with your brand voice and positioning. These aren't required but are encouraged. Use terms that differentiate your brand and reflect your values.
_comments.prohibitedTerms: Words and phrases to avoid. These will cause brand compliance check to fail. Include: competitor names, overused jargon, terms that conflict with brand positioning, casual/unprofessional language, hyperbole, clichés.
_comments.requiredTerms: Terms that MUST appear in content (e.g., trademark names, legal requirements). Leave empty [] if none required. Use sparingly - only for critical brand terms.
_comments.voiceToneKeywords: Descriptive keywords for your brand voice and tone. Used for reference and guidance. Examples: professional, friendly, authoritative, playful, technical, accessible, formal, casual.
_comments.customization: To customize for your brand: 1) Add your brand-specific terminology to approvedTerms, 2) Add competitor names and off-brand terms to prohibitedTerms, 3) Add required trademark/legal terms to requiredTerms, 4) Update voiceToneKeywords to match your brand personality.

requiredTerms_examples: Trademark: 'YourBrand®' (if legally required in all materials)
